See examples under 'Shop' menu.

Compatible with Google Fonts, Typekit, MyFonts, Fonts.com, self-hosted fonts, and others.[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Learn more" button_type="btn-outlined" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyerooleopard.github.io%2Fomnis-docs%2Fdocs%2Ffonto.html||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_background_color="linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0%, #ffffff 100%)" row_flex_wrap="nowrap" el_visibility="phone:hidden" css=".vc_custom_1638365638770{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_row_inner row_background_color="#ffffff" row_shadow="drop-shadow--hover" row_flex_wrap="nowrap" css=".vc_custom_1638365319021{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-palette" icon_typography="font-size:20" icon_style="bg" icon_bg_padding_size="4x" icon_link_transition="" icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Extended Styling Settings." heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Includes advanced styling options, which you can set globally or each page individually.[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Learn more" button_type="btn-outlined" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyerooleopard.github.io%2Fomnis-docs%2Fdocs%2Foptions.html||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_background_color="#ffffff" row_shadow="drop-shadow--hover" row_flex_wrap="nowrap" css=".vc_custom_1638365324021{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-clear_all" icon_typography="font-size:20" icon_style="bg" icon_bg_padding_size="4x" icon_link_transition="" icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Navigation variety." heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Omnis Theme comes with two main navigation layouts. Each layout includes plenty of settings to customize it to your needs.[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Learn more" button_type="btn-outlined" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyerooleopard.github.io%2Fomnis-docs%2Fdocs%2Fnavigation.html|target:_blank"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_background_color="linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0%, #ffffff 100%)" row_flex_wrap="nowrap" el_visibility="phone:hidden" css=".vc_custom_1638365645342{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_row_inner row_background_color="#ffffff" row_shadow="drop-shadow--hover" row_flex_wrap="nowrap" css=".vc_custom_1638365329158{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-devices_other" icon_typography="font-size:20" icon_style="bg" icon_bg_padding_size="4x" icon_link_transition="" icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Super fast performance" heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Optimized at every level to perform blazing-fast on all devices. Includes built-in image optimizer.[/vc_column_text][vc_button2 title="Learn more" button_type="btn-outlined" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyerooleopard.github.io%2Fomnis-docs%2Fdocs%2Fimage-optimization.html|target:_blank"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_background_color="#ffffff" row_shadow="drop-shadow--hover" row_flex_wrap="nowrap" css=".vc_custom_1638365334488{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-grid_on" icon_typography="font-size:20" icon_style="bg" icon_bg_padding_size="4x" icon_link_transition="" icon_bg_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="Tailored Grid System" heading_container="h4"][vc_column_text]Based on bootstrap grid system with unique solutions like adjustable column gaps and 'smart' paddings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_background_color="linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0%, #ffffff 100%)" row_flex_wrap="nowrap" css=".vc_custom_1638365651463{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column column_content_txt_skin="txt--light" column_background_color="#1a1a1a" column_background_image="13805" column_background_image_settings="attachment:fixed" column_background_image_overlay="linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.25) 0%, #1a1a1a 100%)" column_shadow="drop-shadow" css=".vc_custom_1638396137509{border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_empty_space empty_height="single" el_visibility="desktop:hidden|tablet:hidden"][vc_row_inner row_container_height_custom="40vmin" row_container_alignment_v="center" row_column_alignment_h="center"][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8"][vc_column_text animation="scale-up" animation_duration="1200"]

Take your website to [omnis_current_year]!

item.title: Titlebar - Large Subtitle - Simple
item.content:encoded: [vc_row columns_animation="scale-up" columns_animation_duration="1000" columns_animation_delay="500"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-10"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="`{`omnis_title`}`" heading_container="h1" heading_typography="size-class:h3-size"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="`{`omnis_subtitle`}`" heading_container="h2" heading_typography="size-class:h1-mid"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
